title: Open Badge BadgeClass Definition v1.1
description: A schematic defining how an issuer defines an open badge to issue to its users

name.description: A name or title of the particular badge defined in the present badge class, which could then be issued to many recipients.

description.description: A short description of the achievement represented by the present badge.

image.description: The URL of the image that represents the present achievement. It will be baked into a complete badge for each recipient.

criteria.description: The URL of a human-readable page describing the criteria for earning the achievement. If the badge represents an educational achievement, consider marking up this up with LRMI.

issuer.description: URL of an object describing the organization that issued the badge. Endpoint should be JSON following the IssuerOrganization schema

tags.description: An array of text: List of tags that describe the type of achievement.

alignment.description: List of objects describing which educational standards this badge aligns to, if any. An array of AlignmentObjects.

url.description: URL linking to the official description of the standard.
